{ "tiddlers": { "$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body": { "title": "$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body", "$": ":", "caption": "Let's you choose which field you want to edit.", "created": "20150811201945889", "editing": "", "field": "text", "mklauber": "", "mklauber-editing-field": "text", "modified": "20160309190406743", "tags": "$:/tags/EditTemplate Trick", "text": "\define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/Body/ <$set name="editField" filter="[all[current]get[mklauber-editing-field]]" value={{!!mklauber-editing-field}} emptyValue="text"> <$list filter="[is[current]has[_canonical_uri]]">
<> <$text text={{!!_canonical_uri}}/> <$edit-text field="_canonical_uri" class="tc-edit-fields">
<$list filter="[is[current]!has[_canonical_uri]]"> <$select field='mklauber-editing-field' default='text'> <$list filter='[is[current]fields[]sort[]]'> <$reveal state="$:/state/showeditpreview" type="match" text="yes"> <> <$button type="set" set="$:/state/showeditpreview" setTo="no"><>
<$set name="tv-tiddler-preview" value="yes"> <$transclude field="text" />
<$edit-text field=<> tag="textarea" class="tc-edit-texteditor" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}}/>
<$reveal state="$:/state/showeditpreview" type="nomatch" text="yes"> <> <$button type="set" set="$:/state/showeditpreview" setTo="yes"><> <$edit-text field=<> tag="textarea" class="tc-edit-texteditor" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}}/> " }, "$:/plugins/mklauber/field-editor/Readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/mklauber/field-editor/Readme", "created": "20160309192429006", "modified": "20160309192622162", "tags": "", "text": "The purpose of this plugin is to utilize provide a dropdown that allows one to choose which field they wish to edit on the tiddler. This allows people to edit multiple line text in fields more easily. " } } }
